General.Name: Nictus
General.Description: Nictus Limited, an investment holding company, operates as a retailer of household furniture, electrical appliances, and home electronics under the Nictus brand in South Africa. The company operates through Insurance and Furniture Retail segments. It also provides short-term insurance under the Corporate Guarantee brand. The company operates furniture retail stores. Nictus Limited was founded in 1945 and is based in Sandton, South Africa.
